data.thought:
S72|E|S71|Example of what proprioceptive feedback could look like in Thoughtbox response:

```
Thought recorded: #72/200
Session health:
  - coherence: 0.73 (good connectivity)
  - coverage: 0.45 (narrow focus, consider broadening)
  - depth: high (7 layers on phenomenology branch)
  - revision debt: 3 thoughts flagged stale
  - tension: 1 unresolved contradiction [S34â†”S58]
```

This is PROPRIOCEPTION - I 'feel' the shape of my reasoning w/o explicit query.

Critical insight: This feedback should be AMBIENT, not requiring separate query. Like peripheral vision - always there, doesn't require looking.

Impl challenge: Computing these metrics in real-time. Graph analytics on every thought? Could be expensive. Maybe: compute on export, cache, update incrementally.
